short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SKLive聊天室互動表情插件，使用更多有趣貼圖!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
使SKLive表情/貼圖插件，令直播更加有趣！

更多實況主工具，搜尋直播功能就在SKLive: 
http://sk-knower.com/

Privacy practices:
This extension will not collect any user personal data such as website usage,browsing activity and cookies, every setting on the app will only save on user local disk.
